newsitem.title: USA: JWCharles Financial begins exchange offer.
newsitem.headline: JWCharles Financial begins exchange offer.

text.p: JWCharles Financial Services Inc said Tuesday it has began an exchange offer for not less than 51 percent of the outstanding common shares of Americas Growth Fund Inc.

JWCharles said it wil exchange 0.431 of its common shares for each common share of AGRO. The exchange ratio is based in part on AGRO's net asset value as of March 31, which was $3.74 per share, it said.
The offer is being made by JWCharles directly to AGRO shareholders. JWCharles currently owns about 25 percent of AGRO's outstanding shares.
Through its units, JWCharles is engaged in securities brokerage, trading, investment banking and related financial services.
Americas Growth Fund is a business development company which seeks long-term capital appreciation by investing in U.S. companies.
